document.full_text: standard and poor's threatened to cut japan's sovereign credit rating again, warning the huge cost of last month's devastating earthquake will hurt already weak public finances unless bickering politicians can agree to raise taxes.
document.title: s&p cuts japan sovereign rating outlook on quake costs
lines_and_colors: standard and poor's threatened to cut japan's sovereign credit rating again, warning the huge cost of last month's devastating earthquake will hurt already weak public finances unless bickering politicians can agree to raise taxes.
